Houston Real Estate Lawyer

Seyer Law Firm is a full-service real estate law firm that specializes helping clients with commercial and residential real estate.
Say Hello

Industry Experience

Real Estate Law

We represent homebuilders, developers, investors, realtors, brokers and much more.

Construction Law

We specialize in residential, civil, commercial and industrial construction industry related issues.

Land Use Law

We can help explain restrictions on your property and help you quickly achieve the best use of your property.

Business Law

We provide a wide variety of legal business services for real estate companies and commercial businesses

Why Seyer Law Firm

At Seyer Law Firm we understand the complexities of commercial and residential real estate. We provide a comprehensive knowledge with issues relating to real estate, including construction, land use and business law. We strive to provide our clients with optimal service and results.
